CustomField.formula: TEXT(MCEILING(SQRT(VALUE(TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) & TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) & TEXT(MINUTE(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate))) & TEXT(SECOND(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate))) & TEXT(MILLISECOND(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate))) & RIGHT(Name, LEN(Name) - 1)))))
CustomField.label: Validation Code
